name: the echoes cardigan
notes:
description:
introducing your new favorite layering piece! the echoes cardigan combines the unique beauty of randomly shifting mandala yarn colors with a delightful pop of texture. the oversized pockets are as cozy as they are practical, perfect for adding a bit of style to any outfit. with an included video tutorial, youâ€™ll find it easy and enjoyable to create this standout design.

[this pattern is free on my blog.][1] 

[find this pattern as a kit with lion brand.][2] the kit comes with all the yarn needed to make your cardigan plus a free copy of the pdf digital download. you can customize your color choices.

[this pattern has a full video tutorial linked in the pattern.][3]


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/the-echoes-cardigan-crochet-pattern/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/4qr9u
  [3]: https://youtu.be/mszydgposbc
